name: Park National Corporation
description: Park National Corporation is a financial services holding company based in Newark, Ohio. Established in 1908, the company provides a wide range of banking services through its network of community banks and financial institutions. Park National is committed to enhancing the economic vitality of the communities it serves, offering personalized banking solutions that include personal and commercial banking, wealth management, and insurance products. The corporation operates various banking divisions, each with a strong local presence and a focus on customer service. Park National's philosophy revolves around building long-term relationships with clients, emphasizing trust and customer satisfaction. The company also actively supports local initiatives and charitable contributions, reinforcing its dedication to community development. With a strong balance sheet and a history of prudent financial management, Park National Corporation is well-positioned to navigate the evolving financial landscape while continuing to serve its customers effectively.

seo.meta_title: Park National Corporation | Community Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Park National Corporation, a trusted provider of banking and financial services dedicated to community engagement and customer satisfaction.

faq.question: What services does Park National Corporation offer?
faq.answer: Park National Corporation offers personal banking, commercial banking, wealth management, and insurance products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Park National Corporation?
faq.answer: David Trautman is the CEO of Park National Corporation.

faq.question: When was Park National Corporation founded?
faq.answer: Park National Corporation was founded in 1908.

faq.question: Where is Park National Corporation headquartered?
faq.answer: Park National Corporation is headquartered in Newark, Ohio, USA.
